choices: Under a table in the living room.
In the hallway upstairs, near the bedrooms.
On the kitchen counter.
On the porch steps, with the front door open.
Down below, on the floor of the dining room.
1.content:
11:57 PM, the digital clock near you reads. Wow, had it already been that long? People had first started coming over at around seven, but it hardly felt like almost five hours had passed. But you hadn't been keeping track of time lately. The party was at your friend Sara's place, and her parents were cool with it, or so you'd heard. Some people had passed out on the couch, though you hadn't seen any sign of alchohol befoehand. Some of the more annoying people who had shown up already left once no one paid any attention to the, so it had worked out by the end. Still, the party wasn't winding down yet, and Sara had suggested that they could just stay the night if they were worried about driving back so late.

The house was pretty big, you had to say. From what you knew Sara and her family were pretty fortunate, and had money to spare. That's probably why everyone hung out there so often. The place was just shy of a mansion, by the look of it. You feel a slight wave a nausea, but dismiss it as an after effect of something you had been dared to eat off of the floor a few hours prior. It was disgusting, but you had money at risk if you didn't finish your dare. You were always getting sucked into gambling, despote how much you were trying to get over it. As far as bad habits go, gambling was the worst. Especially if you're not good at it, you think with a chuckle. But there were matters to attend to.

After about two more minutes, you try to search the room for a certain someone. It was your crush, a girl you'd known since you were a freshman. With no sign of the girl, you decide it's not all that important that you talk to her now and just wait. Eventually the girl would come by, unless she had decided not to spend the night. However, you had noticed that a lot of people were planning on leaving now, and to your dismay all the guys seemed to be leaving. Most of them were your friends too, and you return a wave from your Mark as he heads outside. Crap, now the girls were going to sit you down soon and have a "heart-to-heart talk" or something like that again. Rolling your eyes, you suddenly feel a sharp pain in your stomach.

Clutching your gut, you double over in pain. What the hell was going on, a heart attack or something? These wree your first thoughts. The world appeared to spin around you, your eyesight fuzzy and drifting in and out of focus. Dropping to your knees, you see that no one has even noticed your fall. But how was that possible, surely they had seen... wait, why did everything look so huge all of a sudden? Quickly you look down at yourself, and notice that this can only mean one thing: The world wasn't getting bigger, you were shrinking. It was impossible, that was for sure... yet it was happening. In seconds you have dwindled down to a mere half inch in height. You fall unconscious, sinking to your knees....

12:00 PM.

But to start, where are you now?
1.title: The Clock Strikes Midnight

choices: Alina
Sara
Kelcie
Beth
Bekah
11.content: You awake under the table in the dining room unaware of how you got there. While thinking about what to do, you hear thunderous footsteps cascading from all around you. You look in all directions and notice many pairs of feet. These are you friends and family; they can help right? Maybe one of them knows what happened to make you this way. You rush over to the first pair of feet which happens to belong to...
11.title: Under The Table

choices: Climb up her boot
Climb up the table and try to get her attention from there
She looks down and notice you
111.content:
You've barely seen Alina since she's only one of your newer friends, but you figured she would help you in this state anyhow. Right now she was getting a handful of chips and sitting down on a chair near the table. It took you a long time to get there but you finally got to the seat.

You looked up at Alina. She was really huge, it dawned on you. There were a few options of how to get her attention. You could climb onto her black leather boot and up her body, but then again you risked getting crushed or thrown loose. You could be more stable above the waist, so you could also climb up the table. Of course, there's the unlikeliness of her actually noticing you right now.

What'll it be?
111.title: Alina

choices: she moves and you fall into her boot
nothing happens and you continue your climb
readers choice
1111.content: You decide that climbing her boot would be the easiest option, so you start your climb and make it to the top of the boot.
1111.title: Climb up her boot

choices: She reaches down to brush you off her shoe.
She reaches down to grab you.
Another girl notices you on her shoe.
113.content:
You recognized Kelcie by her platform shoes. She was already pretty tall, but she liked to accentuate it even more by wearing tall shoes too. Besides that, Kelcie was not such a good choice for a girl to get help from. Even though you barely knew her, and she the same of you, from what you've seen of her with other people she is very bossy and belligerent. She was also a bit of a show-off, and when people tried to offer her constructive criticism she called them racist. She also made fun of short people a lot.

However, right now she was the only girl you had access to, so you might as well try to get some help from her. While she was still standing still you took the opportunity and clambered up her shoe. Then you started pinching her leg. You hoped this would get her attention. Then again, with her being so big, she might not feel it.

But after a while, it's obvious that she does.
113.title: Kelcie

choices: Walk closer and try to contact Beth via her feet.
Play it safe and wait a while for someone you know you can trust to enter.
Don't disturb Beth just yet, take a look around.
114.content:
Still within the limits of this table's underside, you take a quick look around. It would be hard to get a positive idea just from a pair of feet, but you might be able to if only you could see their faces or what they're wearing. The table above your head hinders you from doing anything like that, which was why you were unfortunately having to dash toward the feet before knowing who you were dealing with. As you reach the edge and maintain a relatively safe distance from the feet (roughly a foot away, as in twelve inches), the realization comes. After you had craned your neck up as far as it would allow and set your eyes on the giantess who stood before, you see that it is none other than one of your school friends, Beth.

The two of you had flirted in the past, but had never talked anything serious. Still, she had no quarrels with you that you'd ever known. She was one grade below you, and fourteen years old if you remember right. People's birthdays always melded in your memory, they were so hard to keep track of. But you were a sitting duck here in Sara's living room, at the ground where so many giantesses would now be walking. So far Beth was still standing still, talking to someone you didn't recognize even after seeing her enormous visage. Well, there were an array of options for you now, but keeping your head and making the logical choice would make all the difference. These three decisions are:
114.title: Beth, Larger Than Life

choices: Hit her foot, regardless of ramifications.
Go with the tickling technique, should be harmless.
Attempt to climb the giantess, starting at Beth's feet.
1141.content:
Taking in the full scale of your predicament, it dawns on you just how small you truly are. Looking at the foot of the giantess again, your next target, you notice that her big toe is as tall as you are now. Quite the humbling experience, since you're about to try and contact this girl, regardless of the repurcussions. True, she held nothing against you that could be seen on the surface, but from what you know about people there are always little things here and there that people secretly want to exact revenge for. But once she saw your dilemma that would most likely melt away, and you'd like to think that way, even if it didn't occur. Best to think positive when you're an insect among goddesses, after all.

All of this had been racing through your brainscape just as you reached the toes on Beth's left sandaled foot, unmoving as her earsplitting chatter above crashed down on your ears. It wasn't so much that she was being loud, although she had to raise her voice above the music playing in the room, but everything seemed loud to you since shrinking. It was logical that this would happen, but you could really do without the headache that was beginning to form. Pushing away the festering pain for now, you tell yourself there will be time to address that after you were safe in Beth's hands. Facing the imposing monolith of a teen, you gulp slowly, palms sweating. Do or die, so to speak.

You raise your arm up to strike, then think better of it. Punching or any sort of physical assault could easily be mistaken for an insect's bite or movement after all, and that wasn't a light you would want to be seen in once the giantess felt you and looked down. Thinking better of it now, you decide that tickling might be a better option. Still, that might not be enough to actually arouse suspicion, especially as your pink-haired friend is in a conversation with that stranger. However, how many courses of action were left, if not to hit the foot? Climbing; that was possible after all, theoretically. The gravity of the situation is causing your nerves to tense. You'll have to make a determining choice now, before you lose your chance.
1141.title: Methods Of Contact

choices: She bends down to grab you.
Beth seems not to notice.
11411.content:
But in the end, your resolve to be seen before you got into even further danger won out. Besides, if anyone in the immediate range would help you, it would be her. Or so you suspected, since the two of you got along well. Not having the luxury any longer to not make such a big decision, you raise up your arm to hit the foot with all your might. Scurrying over to the side of the foot so you wouldn't get hurt if Beth recoiled from the pain (although it was unlikely that she'd even feel it) you get to a safer position. And hopefully where you now stood would be in plain view for when the goddess look down at her feet and saw you. With that hasty plan refined, you commit the act, slamming your tiny fist into the skin.

A minute ripple was all the evidence you could see that your punch had even made an impact, but it was no up to her nervous system to register the pain, if it was even enough to alert the girl. Waiting in the shadow of the colossus now, your palms continue to sweat from your increasing anxiety. You're also tempted to steal away now and find someone else, when suddenly the conversation between the two giantesses pauses, and you see Beth's titanic visage facing downward, her eyes scanning the floor by her feet. This was perfect, now al you would have to do was run into sight. As fast your little legs would allow you stop in front of her right sandal, waving you arms to be noticed.
11411.title: Refining The Plan

choices: "Sorry, I don't think I know you."
"Oh my god! How did you get so small?"
114111.content:
Your giant friend's facial expression suddenly became shocked. She was looking right at you. "What on Earth is that?" she says, intrigued. Beth bends down and reaches out to grab you. This was just what you had been waiting for! Finally, a chance to get somebody's attention!
Beth's grip was suffocatingly tight. You splutter and wave your arms about, choking. "Don't squeeze me so hard!"
She yelps and brings you up to her face. "You can... talk?" she asks, after hesitating.
"Of course I can! I'm a human being, aren't !?" you shout crossly. "Sorry... didn't mean to hurt your feelings." you continue, as you see Beth look even more shocked.
"Oh my... do- do I know you?" she says. Finally! You were recognized by someone! "Yes! It's me, Beth!" you shout...
114111.title: She bends down to grab you.

choices: You make up a story.
Tell her you don't know how.
1141111.content:
The next words out of her mouth were a fed in a new sense of despair: "Sorry, I don't think I know you."
"What? What do you mean? Don't you recognize me?" Your hoarse yell, reduced to that of a squealing mouse escapes your throat.
"Um, not really. Why, where have I seen you before?" The giantess asks, true confusion resonating in her voice. Unsure what to make of this just yert, you place your heads in your hands, getting more worried by the second. Could she really not recongize her own friend, or was she playing dumb for some potentially deceitful reason? Or maybe neither, a third, more creepy possibility. You look back at the girl, face pale.

"I'm not sure what going on, but we've been friends for years. Here, bring me closer to your eye, you'll be able to tell by then," you tell her, hoping and praying that the only reason you had been mistaken for a stranger was your tiny stature. Beth obliges, bringing you up to her huge eyes, like an orb-shaped searchlight in the sky. A shaken head in response, and the girl shrugs. You gesture rapdily for her to take you somewhere away from all the party's noise, and she nods. Next thing you knew Beth brought you into the bathroom adjacent to the hallway, locking the closed door behind her.
"Even though I can't recall ever meeting you, that doesn't mean I'm just going to do nothing. But I have to ask; how did this happen?
1141111.title: Discovered As A Stranger

choices: "... Put me in your Bra"
"... Put me in your Pants"
1141112.content:
"How did you get so small?" Beth asks, holding you closer to her face.
"I don't know, I was feeling dizzy, then I collapsed and when I came to, I was this size" you shout, she loosens her grip on you and places you on the palm of her hand. "I've got to keep you safe" Beth says "but i don't know where I could put you, unless..."
"Unless what" you ask, she gazes down at you and asks
"where would you like me to put you to keep you safe"
You look Beth up and down, you can see her nice sized breasts barely covered by her tee, you also recall her having quite a nice, firm ass, you ponder over this for a moment.
In the end you decide, "Beth, I'm sorry but i think it would be safest if you...."
1141112.title: "Oh my god! How did you get so small?"

choices: You're too deep in the carpet to be crushed.
Beth crushes your pathetic body into pulp.
114112.content:
She had to have seen you now. After a tiring display of your existence, you must stick out like a sore thumb by now. At first nothig happens, but you can feel a piercing glare cutting through you from above. A quick look upward reveals Beth's eyes wide open in surprise. The excitement rising in your chest dies down, however, when you notice why she was surprised. The realization you thought you had observed as seeing you, a shrunken human being at her feet, was anything but. How could you have not anticipated this before? She didn't think you were a man, she saw what she had expected to see, an insect that had just "bitten" her toe. The dreaded foot-raising occurs next, eclisping the light around you.

Not wanting to make any further mistakes, barely even dodge the first stop. A slightly-frustrated sigh comes from the giantess, but then as her friend notices and laughs she shifts to a more sporting mood. Now this whoelt hing would be a game, one in which your squishing is the objective. You're literally running for your life now, as Beth continues the game, once again narrowly missing your tiny, running body. The impact, though, is enough to send you sprawling across the floor, end you end up flat on your back. Unable to dislodge yourself from the tangled nest of carpet fibers you landed in, all you can do is watch as the titanic foot of your friend descends on top of you, with two giantesses giggling in unison all the while.
114112.title: A Grievous Error

choices: Beth wanders away, still giggling, but her friend is more perserverant.
The two of them are distracted, so yuo quickly emerge and run for cover.
1141121.content: Perhaps it was best that the fibers restrained you as you were about become very well acquainted with the sole of Beth's sandal. Not because they didn't allow you to escape, but as you discovered after opening your eyes and letting loose the tight breath you'd taken to brace for your immediate death, you were too deeply rooted into the carpet to recieve any of the crushing power of Beth's foot. At least for the moment, you were unreachable to her and her and her hyena friend. They would probably give up and leave you, and from there you could pick yourself up and do a serious re-thinking of your strategy, which only a stroke of fate could have provided for you.
1141121.title: Deeply Rooted

1141122.content:
You are almoist beyond panic as of yet, struggling against the thick carpet fibers. It's to no avail, unfortunately for you. Just as you had freed one arm from the vine-like sprouts you look up and see your fate rushing down to meet you. All you can do is gape at the enormous object bearing down to meet you; Beth's foot. With the force of what you could only equate with a freight train, the sole of Beth's foot comes slamming down on you. At first you feel nothing at all; perhaps because she had numbed you entirely by simultaneously crushing every bone in your body.

"You got him!" Beth's friend squeals in delight.

Although you can't decide whether this is good or bad, you can still see this entire event unfold before your eyes. You'd committed a grievous error contacting her so soon, either that or you just had the worst luck. But hell, what had you expected from hitting the giantess's foot? Surely she would affirm that you were a bug before she thought to look for a tiny man. But it's too late now, and amongst the booming laughter of Beth and her friend you are stepped on again and again until only a bloody stain is all that marks your passing.
1141122.title: Crushed

choices: Jump on Beth's shoulder bag for a rest.
Stay on Beth and hope to hell you don't fall.
11413.content:
You cant help but notice as you climb onto her big toe that the tiny little hairs is about as big as you are. That and they are tickling the hell out of your backside. You glance up as you reach her ankles on top the huge mountain of flesh to notice that she is still talking... Good, you think to yourself, I've got plenty of time. But as you adjust your tiny feet to stay put on her now large, tall legs you find that it may not of been such a good idea. Your hands wrap around her and as you take in a deep breath and hope you have the energy to climb her, you feel a jerk that forces you to fall back to her ankles. You catch yourself just before falling completely off her foot. You look up. She was just adjusting her feet. Whew.

So you climb back up slowly and with every thing your tiny little body had until finally you reach her calves. You're completely exhausted, however somewhat proud (odd, I know) that you made it this far. You look up once more. Sweat had already started beading on your tiny forehead which was distracting your view but beyond what you were able to see... you spotted the color pink and I'm not talking about her hair.

Yet, at this point your arms and legs feel unattached to the rest of your body and keeping them pressed against her legs was almost impossible at this point. You look around hoping for someone... something... anything that could help.. but all you found was a bag that belonged to the girl Beth was talking to. It was just the right height to jump.. but do you really want to do it? Sure it would give you time to calm down and rest and then you could presume climbing Beth to get her attention..But before you could think of any other way, Beth's body began to part from the girl and you could see the bag getting further away.. Do you jump? Or do you take the chance of falling?
11413.title: The Titaness

choices: Beth scoops you up in a handful of Dots.
You try to get her attention.
114131.content:
Never much of a risk-taker, you see the first option as the safest. It might be little more than justification for yourown cowardice,but you were in a surreal situation for which there were no precepts to look back on. For all you knew, it would be suicide to continue scaling Beth as you currently were, and you had gotten lucky to survive even her most idle movements. Using a few seconds of preparation for the leap, you make it to the bag successfully, with a close call when you nearly failed to hoist your body up after your arms landed in the bag first. You had clutched the malleable fabric and utilized an upper-body strength you didn't know you possessed to spare yourself a fatal fall.

The sickening humor in all of this was that your pink-haired friend had no clue that you were scraping out such a meager existence at her feet,or else she would be inclined to help you out. Until you made it to somewhere that you felt comfortable getting Beth's attention from, your life was essentially in her hands. You adjust yourself to drop into the bag, vainly hoping it would be exclusively soft items. Your brief drop concludes with you hitting your ass on what felt like a cell phone. There could have been worse things to land on, but you still muttered a string of curses as you hunted for a soft surface.

Your horrible luck seems to turn as you find a half-opened box of Dots candy. They were like beanbags toyou, and might even double as a potable food source after you'd inspected them. Prying the thin package open, three Dots spill out, nearly bowling you over. You pick the closest one and just lean on it, letting the fatigue ebb from your limbs. That's when the bag began to jostle a bit, and the prodigious face of Beth loomed over the beg. She had placed it onto her lap, sitting now, and was peering at its contents. Naturally, the alarming realization that she had come for the candy was overshadowed as an unescapable hand descended toward you.
114131.title: Dots

choices: You sneeze and Beth hears you
Too late, Beth shoves the rest of your dots into her mouth
1141311.content: You feel yourself being scooped up very hurriedly by Beth, who seems to be peering at her handful (or rather fistful) with a curioisity, but you knew it was useless to resist your plight as a dark shadow descends upon her load of Dots and she looks hungrily, you brace yourself for the payback, but her pinkish hair tickles your nose as she brings it close.
1141311.title: Beth scoops you up in a handful of Dots.

choices: Beth tastes you, grimaces, and spits it all out onto the counter.
You are swallowed as Beth tilts her head back.
11413112.content:
At first you wave in futility, hoping that you might be seen before it was too late. As Beth's hair brushes against you, burying you in its coarse ropes. You find yourself clawing blindly through a pink forest, which in reality was just a few dozen strands of hair. The handful of Dots which you remained buried in are lifter ever higher toward the maw of your friend, shifting in such a way that you were paralyzed under their weight, rendering anything below your neck unusable.

You decide to conserve whatever energy you had left, and think of another way out of this. Beth licked her lips in anticipation, never noticing you in the colorful variety that the Dots provided. It was like some form of irony, but in your panic you couldn't name which, and didn't care to muster the will to focus on something so trivial.
"Beth! It's me, your friend! BETH!" you scream, craning your neck toward her terrifying visage.

A clamorous sound which shook your body followed, and your eyes are now clamped tightly shut from bracing. The avalanche of Dots begins to spill onto Beth's tongue, which curled in savoring delight. The unlikely hope that you could still pull through creeps at the sidelines, and yet a few saliva-covered Dots slamming you into the tongue pounds that idea into dust. The bleak scene unfolding takes a turn, however, as...
11413112.title: Taste Testing

114131122.content: You feel beth tilt her head back. "Noooo" you scream as you and the dots are swallowed. You slide down her esophagus, and all you can hear is the beating of Beth's heart as you slowly slide deeper into her. Seconds later you are pushed into Beth's stomach, falling into her digestive juices, where you will surely be digested later. You sit and think about how you were just swallowed by a friend of yours while awaiting your inevitable end. On the outside Beth and the others are having lots of fun during the party completely unaware of you being digested in Beth's stomach.
114131122.title: You are swallowed as Beth tilts her head back.

choices: Go for the pinch on her leg, maybe she'll feel it.
Bite her leg...this should definitely get her to stop.
114132.content:
Amazingly, your grip is holding strong to Beth's leg, but you know for certain that it will not last much longer. If you can just climb a little bit higher and reach Beth's skirt, maybe you can ride in one of the pockets. But remember where you are at the moment: you are near her knee and the climbing is getting more tiring by the second.

Meanwhile, Beth has decided to head to the kitchen to refill her glass of Diet Coke. Unaware of the tiny passenger holding onto her leg, Beth begins to walk--this should be interesting for the tiny passenger below.

Sure enough, Beth moves...and your grip begins to slip, but then you get an idea: since now you are higher up on her leg, maybe if you pinch the right area, Beth will surely look down and maybe...just maybe...see you. But you have to be careful, because if you pinch while she is walking, she might jump, and you'll lose your grip for sure.

What about biting her leg? Maybe that will stop her moving completely and she'll look down. But you have to hurry though, for one...Beth is nearing the kitchen, and two...your about to fall off her leg.
114132.title: Our next stop on the tour is the kitchen.

choices: Be brave and make your way to Bekah.
Another giantess enters the room...
You stay put, but meanwhile realize you're starving.
115.content:
...well, that was the problem. You weren't exactly who you were running to. You stop your foolish dash, shoes making a squeak as you stopped abruptly. It had to have been luck that you woke up in such a safe spot like underneath the table, and you didn't want to waste it before you were sure it was safe to emerge. You lean against the inside of the table leg, observing the world outside.

The gigantic pair of feet were walking past the table now, making noises louder than you could have imagined as they passed. They were perfect feet however, and caught your trained, macrophilic eyes. This was both a nightmare and a dream come true for you combined; you had always wanted to be insect-sized at the feet of a goddess, but in reality this was too close. And in your fantasies death had never been so close.

Fighting back lustful urges to reach out and touch the feet that were within reach, you try to rationalize going out now. After all, you had to get help, that much was insinctual. Here was a passing savior, for all you knew. She could leave at any moment, and your best chance could be forever lost. Your justifications were well put, but deep down you knew something wasn't right.

Then there was the question of how you even got here, so small. A scary possibility that one of the girls at the party had shrunk you in the first place rears its ugly head, but what were the chances of that? Yet what were the chances that a normal-sized man could suddenly shrink to the size of a bug? The titaness passes you by, and you lose sight of her plodding, but it sounds just as loud. She must still be close, then.

A harmless peek from behind the table leg showed you she was still there, but you wish you kenw who it was. Hunching over so that the top of the table wouldn't obstruct your view, you can't help but gasp. The giantess was Bekah, and your own blood was your closest lifeline, right? Dropping to a crouched run, you pass the table leg which was just inches from the side of a couch, ducking behind it. Decisions had to be made.
115.title: Bekah Passes By

choices: She feels you immediately, and wiggles more.
Climb ever higher, it won't be long.
Chicken out, but you fall between her toes.
1151.content:
Now was the time to be brave, if there ever was. Although you were about the size of a pin and were about to venture into uncharted territory, there was little else left to choose from. If you didn't grab the attention of the closest passing giantess, who was to say you would ever survive in this harsh new world? You are still retreating into your thoughts, you realize, and face straight ahead. Bekah is en route to the other side of a wide expanse of carpeted floor, which you would be obligated to cross if you planned to flag down your cousin before unwanted attention arrived.

The panicked ideas of what unmentionable things could happen if someone you didn't trust spotted you fuels your motions, and thus you leave the table behind. Strolling across this forest of carpet strands wouldn't be easy, but at least the quaking tremors of the partying giantesses was far enough away that you felt relatively comfortable. Conveniently, some of the blasting music changed a more suspenseful sound, fitting the mood quite nicely. Bekah adjusts herself in her seat on the couch ahead, and you put your eyes on the prize.

Contrary to what you would have expected, at this size every aspect of your fetish was increased. You even start to have arousing thoughts about your dear cousin, even as you try to keep them out of your mind. This has only worsened, however, by the time you have reached the base of this monolith; her expansive bare foot is your landmark. It occurs to you that it is kind of illogical for Bekah's socks and shoes to be off, but you had noticed a trend among the girls lately to party barefoot at times... you would in all probability never understand this concept.

Do or die, your mind repeats while you stare blankly. The feet are moving of course; her toes wiggle absentmindedly as she pulls out her cell after getting a text. This would be the opportunity of the night, then. Wasting less time would be a good idea too, you decide as you stand just an inch from the domineering big toe of your female cousin. Grasping it tightly, you hoist yourself on top of the gloss-painted toenail, hugging the side of it for support until you have successfully made it on entirely. Progress was being made here, you think, amidst recurring fear waves.
1151.title: Bravery In The Face Of Danger

choices: ...Bekah's awestruck face looking down at you.
...the giantess' foot rising over your body...
11511.content:
The intial fear comes over you as you get atop her toenail, but at the same time you attempt to reassure yourself of your decision. After all, blood was thicker than water, and if anyone would help you out in this massive house it would be your own cousin. Besides, you and her were pretty close, and had gotten each other out of a fair amount of scrapes in the past. Of your options for giantess assistants here, Bekah was undoubtedly the most logical choice. Still, it wasn't very comforting physically as you now found yourself clambering over a bare foot about the size of a small freighter from your perspective. This had better work, you tell yourself.

But what about if she found you, so helpless and vulnerable like this, and was tempted? It was a sobering thought; especially since there was very little you could do to stop your giantess cousin if she decided not to keep her end of the bargain. Then again, there wasn't much you had to offer to convince her but your desperate plea of family. Still, Bekah was far from a heartless girl, so there shouldn't be any doubts. As if on cue, however, you suddenly find your legs falling out from beneath you, and your reach out for a support, grabbing only fistfuls of empty air. In the wake of this you suddenly realize (albeit too late now) what had caused the commotion.

What had seemed like idle wiggling before had spread to the entire foot. One such movement had sent you falling down through the space between her toes. Before you could sink too deeply into the gap, though, you raise your arms spread-eagle to make a bridge of yourself in the gap. Your eyes catch a reflection of ligth filtered throughthe glass. Having been in the midst of a brainstorm, an idea comes to you through that. As both monolithic girls continue to chat, you stand and lean against the edge of the glass (cup that is). Getting in the most effective position you can think of, you push with all of your diminutive might on the glass, which was already just about two inches from the counter's edge. The heaving continues, and you finally see movement as a slight scraping sound (probably inaudible to the giantesses) commences.

You eventually get close enough that you just want tit to be over; the exertion taking its toll on you. You hadn't heardthe end of the conversation, but Beth was already turning to leave, so you push harder before she gets a chance to. Sure enough, the heavy glass is halfway off the table, teetering for a few moment before falling. The shattering noise is deafening for you, and the momentum caused by shoving it over the edge sends you flat on your back.

The sound of it and the liquid spill causes Bekah to jump (she's closer) and Beth to turn around and cringe, putting her hand over her mouth. You feel slightly guilty for wrecking Sara's things, because her parents would get pissed, but this was an emergency.
"I swear I didn't leave that on the edge!" Bekah exclaims, partly out of shock.
"Sara's gonna kill us. Quick we need to clean it up," a panicked Beth says, reaching for a paper towel.

In a few seconds you have Bekah kneeling in front of the counter, scrubbing the soda off the floor with a towlet. Beth isstanding right near you grabbing the paper towels, but not looking down.
1312.title: Shattering Point

choices: She stood up and you fall in her ear canal.
"What was that"
13121.content:
You see that Bekah's head is near so you take advantage and make a jump to her hair, you grab to a long black hair near her neck.
You grab with all your strength to the black rope and start going up to get her attention, meanwhile Bekah and Beth are cleaning the mess.
"Phew, that's all" Says Beth.
"Luckily Sarah didn't come and we have saved the situation" Bekah says.
Meanwhile you are near Bekah's side of face and going upwards to her ear. After a while you se the giant earlobe and jump inside the ear of your cousin, Bekah's still unaware that you're now in her ear and sits down on the couch.
¡BEKAH! You yell in the hole of her ear.
13121.title: Climbing her hair

choices: Kelcie shrugs off the feelings, and it's the crumb (and you.)
Kelcie changes her mind, and heads for the trashcan.
Kelcie playfully smashes the crumb on someones face!
132.content:
You've never quite been the kind of guy to appreciate the intricacies of a human hand, but this new size already had you reconsidering the finer details of this powerful behemoth that was barreling through the sky, towards you.

What time wasn't spent staring up in awe and fear at the teenager's titanic fingers and palm, were spent running from them. There wasn't much reason behind running though, Kelcie was bound and determined to get just a taste of that moist, delicious cake everyone had been raving about. She'd been trying to watch her weight, keep that girlish figure of hers, and a whole piece of cake had far too many calories for her to consider. However, this bite-sized, lonely piece of cake that had fallen from the whole was just enough to wet her tastebuds. Reaching down in a swooping motion, Kelcie set her hand behind the piece of cake, and you, and pushed it into her hand.

You, unsure if you would rather take your chances diving towards the ground, or with Kelcie's appetite, were not given much of a choice in the matter though. It seemed you were going to get a little of both worlds.

Looking behind you, Kelcie's hand dwarfed the cake crumb, easily. The crumb itself was about as big as the pad of her thumb, and you were about the size of speck, or a grain of sand. Honestly, you weren't sure, but it mattered very little, when you saw that crumb sliding toward you, powered and dwarfed by the fleshy wall of the teenager's hand. Try as you might, you ran for the edge of the table, but only succeeded in making it half the distance, before that cake crumb tumbled over you, the moist surface tousling you around, and burying you within it's sugary goodness, like an avalanche would a skier.

Another split second of rolling, before you found yourself airborn, almost. Kelcie knocked the crumb, and it's victim, off of the counter, towards her empty hand hovering below the table's edge. Landing in the goddess' hand, the cake crumb fell apart, partially, and you tumbled into the vast field of teenage hand-flesh, covering in even smaller crake crumbs, and more dizzy than injured. The warmth of Kelcie's hand immediately became very uningnorable, as did the shadows of her towering fingers, as they began to curl menacingly above you.

As you attempt to break through the rest of your cake-enclosure, you find yourself tumbling over again, as Kelcie lifts her hand up to her face. You're given an undeniably intense ride up to the raven-haired giantess' face, and stop just below her chin. Above, you can see her face. She seems to be unsure of her decision. You don't know why, but it seems as though she is very hesistant to make a snack of this little crumb. Youre not sure why.
132.title: Kelcie's hand, reaching for the crumb you w...

choices: Do you survive in Kelcie's stomach?
Do you get digested?
1321.content:
"Oh, God!" you think.

Then you shout, trying to get Kelcie's attention, "Kelcie! I'm right here!!!"

She doesn't hear you as she brings you (and the crumb) to Kelcie's open mouth and tosses you inside and swallows as soon as the crumb (with you stuck to the icing) lands onto her tongue.

"Yummmmmmmmmm, that was delish! For a crumb that is!" you hear Kelcie say as you go down her esophagus.

Thump, thump, thump goes Kelcie's heart as you are pushed downwards in her esophagus, the trip taking only about a couple of minutes.
1321.title: Kelcie shrugs off the feelings, and it's th...

choices: You climb out and get on the floor
Suddenly, someone comes and grabs the trash bag
Someone suddenly throws something away and hits you
1322.content:
Though the crumbs looked good, Kelcie decided she wasn't hungry enough. She tightened her fist and started walking. You looked through a gap between her fingers to see where you were headed. As soon as you saw the trash can, you started to panic. Being eaten by this giantess was one thing, but being thrown away was worse to you. You slammed against her fingers, but she didn't seem to notice.

Before you knew it, you fell straight into the trash can. You could hear Kelcie walk away. You look around to see messy paper plates. You were against one with colorful frosting. After a moment, you started to climb out. It was sticky, and messy, but it was the only way. As you got close to the top, you smiled, you were going to make it!
1322.title: Garbage boy

choices: On the floor
Between her breasts
On a chair
1323.content: It all happened so fast. One moment Kelcie was gazing down on you, the next, she had her arm wound up, and the next, you were sailing in the air, hurtling towards Beth. Faster...faster...too fast! You bounced off of her face and landed...
1323.title: Food Flight

choices: Yes
No
133.content: As you looked among the enormous crumbs that were scattered along the table you saw a huge shadow which was Beth's mouth. She was ready to vacuum any loose crumbs and you along with them. As you ran for your life you thought you were going to trip and fall and be sucked into Beth's immense maw. But did you trip?
133.title: Beth's mouth, coming down to suck stray cru...

choices: Sara agrees to help you get back to normal.
Sara refuses, instead opting to keep you for herself as a pet.
Someone else interupts you and Sara before she can give you an answer.
134.content:
As you look up to the source of the shadow, you see that it is Sara walking by. Just then, Sara calls out to you.

"[Name], where are you? Are you in here? [Name]!"

Hearing that your friend was searching for you, you decide that the safest course of action would be to get her attention right now. If she knew where you were, then she probably wouldn't hurt you. You immediately begin jumping up and down while waving your arms.

"Sara! I'm down here! Look!"

Sara, upon hearing your tiny voice, looks down in your direction. She practically falls over in shock as she sees the sight of her best friend, shrunken to half an inch tall, and standing on her kitchen counter.

"[Name]?! Is that really you?! What happened to you?!"

"I don't know, Sara! I just-"

"Hold on [Name], it's really hard for me to hear you. Here, get on my hand so I can lift you closer to my face."

Sara then lowered her hand down next to you and allowed you to climb onto her palm. Once you had reached the center of her hand, Sara lifted you up to her face.

"Wow [Name], you really are tiny! So, what was it that you were saying?"

"Well, I really don't know what happened to me. One minute I was normal sized and enjoying your party, and the next minute I'm the size of a bug!"

"Hehe, well... I think that you look kinda cute at this size!"

"Sara, this is serious! Please, you have to help me get back to normal!"


What happens next?
134.title: Sara's shocking discovery

choices: Somebody suddenly closes the front door.
You hear someone coming...
"What is that down there?" you hear a voice say.
You decide to climb the porch step.
A friend of yours leaves the house, and sits on the porch step.
14.content:
Wakefulness slowly finds you again as you sit up, your stomach still hurting like hell But strangely, you also feel very cold. You rub your eyes and look around the room, and notice that you are outside, on some massive stone slab. Further observation reveals this to be Sara's porch step, and the front door is open, illuminating a small area around the door. How on earth did you get here? When you had mysteriously shrunk, you were in the front room, weren't you? Although, if something as outrageous as suddenly shrinking were to happen, why wouldn't you be shifted to a different place as well?

You stand up to explore your surroundings, when suddenly a sneaker-clothed foot lands next to you. Looking upwards, you see it is a girl you don't know, just leaving the party. From what you can hear, the house is a lot quieter, so you were probably unconscious for a considerable amount of time.

The step leading up to the front door was about 5 times taller than you, way too tall to climb unless you could find footholds in it. You listen closely, and hear a conversation going on between a few girls, one or two voices of which you recognised. Maybe if one of them decided to leave, you could attempt to catch their attention, or hitch a ride on their shoe, or something like that. Neither of these choices seemed logical, but then the whole situation was illogical. It is very difficult to distinguish a movie-like scenario from reality at the time being...
14.title: On the porch steps, with the front door open.

choices: She notices
Shes doesn't notice. Whew!
You climb on top of her to keep from being seen
142.content:
Immediately, I hear something scream in my ears nearby. As I open them and stare around, I'm unable to see anything and the fact that it was dark didn't help. But the sound was very familiar as I concentrated and soon, I no longer heard the girls voices or the insects chirping. Thinking nothing of it, I turned to go back inside the house when something very large slammed me in the back of the head like a hammer hitting a nail. The pain was intense and the force pounded me against the hardness of the concrete.

It felt like my lungs were crushed completely as the heavy box slammed me from behind. Yeah, I know sounds kinky. My eyes felt like they were bulging from their sockets. My lungs felt like they were about to give up completely as they screamed for one last breath. Pain overwhelmed me and its so intense that I'm not sure I will survive. I pushed my almost broken body over and turned to stare blankly at the package. A delivery truck? In the middle of the night? I must be dreaming...

Then I heard it. The sound of feet running along the inside of the house, right towards me!

"Oh, a package!" I hear someone yell from the door.

"Crap" I said as I squirmed to get loose from under the package's grip but it was too late. Just as the hands picked the box up, I was trapped in the paper wrapping.

Being lifted into the air, my hands held the straps of the box as the rest of my tiny body fell loosely in full range of her view. But what would happen when she discovered me hanging there? Would see even notice?
142.title: You hear someone coming...

choices: Sara deposits the package on the counter, but you remain as she leaves.
She decides to open the package while standing, causing you to fall inside.
The giantess feels your jump, grabbing you between her thumb and forefinger.
1423.content:
The package is heavy, at least to your mysterious carrier, and is shifted back toward her chest to distribute the weight.
"This is really weird... but hey, let's see what's inside," the girl calls to other people inside.
Now you know who it is though, judging by the voice! Although it sounded deepened by size, there was no mistaking that the tone belonged to Sara, the party's hostess and the one who had invited you here. Some party this had become, though, you think grimly. You are still hanging precariously, but you had since gotten to a more controllable position by the back of the package. It was all too surreal, though, seeing this macroscopic world zip by you as Sara briskly walks back through the door and into the house.

Looking around, you realize that the box's strap is swinging like a pendulum, a movement that had nearly made you fall to your death earlier. A proverbial lightbulb flashes over your head, as you see the direction you'll in mere seconds be swinging in. Pursing your lips in determination, you decide to make a leap at the apex of the swing, allowing you to sail through the otherwise small distance (several "feet" for you) toward Sara's body. As calculated as the jump had been, you didn't land at all where you had expected... and it was a little embarassing. You now hung from the outside of Sara's shirt, just in front of her bra. You silently ask whatever entities that were in charge of your shrinking just to keep Sara from noticing you at this point, where you are right now. She'd never forgive you for the invasion of privacy.
1423.title: Gray Territory

choices: She thinks you're an insect (uh oh!)
She's going back up the stairs, hop on fast!
She saw a meteor and she will watch it, sitting on the porch step (and you!)
143.content:
"WHAT IS THAT?" The voice booms out, nearly deafening you.
"I DON'T KNOW, GO CHECK."
Suddenly, a loud series of tremors disrupts your perch on the porch steps and you fall face-first onto the stair. The tremors seem to get closer...and closer. You scramble to get up, blood pounding in concert with the earthquake. The tremors are near now... Then, from the shadows, a massive boot appears, connected to an unseen figure by a wide blue column of denim. It lands next to you, causing a huge tremor along the step -- but at least this time, you managed to keep your balance. Then a second boot comes crashing down from above, on your other side. You try to look up, to see who this behemoth is, but your view is blocked as the vast jean pillars move again, and the figure goes down to the next step. Now you can see who it is -- Sara. She turns on the step, and her voice rumbles, "WHERE DID IT GO?" As your head clears and your ears stop ringing, you see her face looming over you, eyes scanning the stairs. You take a step back. Suddenly, her eyes flashed over to where you were, trying to sense any more movement. You froze, sweating, as she hovered for a moment longer. Then, to your great relief she broke off, and you saw her enormous leg bend. But then you felt the grip of terror again as you wondered what her next move would be...
143.title: Sara on the Stairs

choices: Grab onto her ankle.
Climb down and try to navigate.
Stay put and hope she goes.
145.content:
While you're contemplating just how Hollywood this whole scenario was, you hear the creak of the door opening. However, it wasn't a creak in your ears; more like the sound of a tipped-over garbage truck times ten. You instinctively clamp your hands over your ears to halt the sound's progress, and then also crouch below the step just in case. You're haven't really articulated the pros and cons of being spotted to yourself just yet. Besides, who knows who this even is, coming out of the house? The screen door opens as well, then clangs loudly as it is closed again.

The suspense by now is killing you, and the similarities from what media you've accumulated told you not to look. That was always how the stupid people were killed off; they tried to get a good look at the danger without having a safe place to run to. You did in this case, though, since your current hiding place was working out just fine. Without further hesitation you start to scale the step, just as you notice a titanic, snadal-clad foot sailing over you and settle several inches to the left of where you had been waiting before.

As you are still clinging the the craggy step, the foot's pair goes over you as well, and this time it actually lands where you had been sitting. So acting quickly had paid off after all! You could have just as easily met an untimely end if you hadn't chosen to scout ahead when you did. But you weren't out of the fire yet. The anonymous giantess was sitting two steps above yours, allowing her legs to rest on your own porch step. That meant that whoever this was had decided to sit down here for an indefinite amount of time. This made things more complicated.

At the moment, her thigh was just a few inches out from where you hung, and the foot lower still, about the size of a freight train. You could either continue climbing into what appeared to be the girl's pant leg, or drop off entirely and just navigate past the feet. And the third option would be that you just wait here and see what she does. For all you know she might rise up and leave sooner than you expected. A dreary sigh is released from the giantesses lips, and you realize who it was. If the voice was hers, it was definitely Kelcie!
145.title: Take A Seat

choices: Kelcie suddenly stands up.
You decide to continue the climb.
Getting her attention now would be a better idea.
1451.content:
Well, why not seize the opportunity that presents itself? That had always been your method of doing things, so why not now? What could you have to lose? Your life? Well, you would probably lose that anyway if you did not make a move soon. Although you had to be careful, as you do not know when Kelcie might stand up.

With this thought, you traverse the decidedly rocky porch step and cautiously grab hold of Kelcie's ankle. Craning your neck, you look straight upwards and see the somewhat familiar face of Kelcie quite far above you. Just how much had you shrunk!?

As Kelcie's ankle is obviously covered in skin, there are very little footholds, although it is still easier than you expected. You start to formulate a plan in your head as to what you will do when you reach your destination. No, before that you need to define your destination. Perhaps you could hide in some part of her clothing and attempt to catch her attention? She is wearing some sandals, an impractically short, tight pair of denim shorts, and some leggings that emphasize her rather long legs. The leggings would be easier to climb than her bare ankle, so that would be your first target. But then would be a long and treacherous climb to her denim shorts far above you. Perhaps it would be a better idea to get her attention by biting her ankle, or making lots of noise? There was always the risk of being mistaken for a pesky insect...
1451.title: Grab onto her ankle.

choices: Kelcie drops her phone in surprise.
Your bite went unnoticed.
14513.content:
Maybe you are just feeling impatient at the moment, or maybe it was just your fear of heights that comepelled you to decide. Getting her attention right now would be a better idea. Less climbing, less risk. But there was definitely a bit of climbing down you would have to do before you ventured out enough to actually try to establish that connection with Kelsie. There was no telling how she might react to a bite or whatever you chose to do, and at this minute size she could wreak havoc on you if you aren't prudent with your choices.

After sliding down the height of Kelcie's ankle like a fireman down a pole, you know things are going swimmingly so far. Your giantess friend has already pulled out a cell phone to fit some texting in, which is probably why she chose to come out here alone. The party within the house wasn't an ideal place for that, after all. Apparently whatever she's reading is improving her mood, and the wiggling of her toes catches your dilligently-trained eyes. Nevertheless, you practically glide over to the foot of the statue otherwise knows as Kelcie and take a look upward.

The giantess was truly beautiful; at regular size and even more so now. It was magnified, along with everything else accompanying her in this now-gigantic world around you. The mission might not be so depressing, then, if she reacted well to you. Not wanting to waste time on last-minute musings, you stride up to the foot, take a step onto the girl's sandal and stick out your neck. This would be sort of gross, but it was certainly a necessity if you wanted to make sire this got her attention. Biting down was the hard part.
14513.title: Kelcie

choices: Kelcie notices you.
Kelcie doesn't seem to notice you.
145131.content:
"Yeow!" Kelcie yelps, dropping the mobile phone she is texting on.
The colossal phone crashes down inches away from you, scaring the life out of you. The battery cover falls off the phone as this happens. It looks like your bite had caught Kelcie's attention.

"What the hell was that?" Kelcie wonders, scanning the porch step with her eyes. You back away from her foot and attempt to make yourself known, as this is probably one of your only chances to make yourself known...
145131.title: Kelcie drops her phone in surprise.

choices: Shout as loudly as you can.
Search for a decent sized pebble.
145132.content:
You bite down into the giantess's surprisingly tough skin, yet unsurprisingly bad-tasting. You grimace and spit in disdain, hoping that she noticed your little attempt.
About of suspense pass, and the girl still does not look fazed. Apparently your miniscule size prevented your bite from registering in her nervous system. It looks like you are going to have to try something else.

The possibility of climbing Kelcie's leg still seems feasible, but the sheer thought of it causes your stomach to churn; heights had never been your strong point. But maybe, like the saying goes, your bark is louder than your bite. Making as much noise as possible and waving your arms around, or something like that might work. Yes, that idea seems to make much more sense than climbing the smooth, featureless plain extending into the sky above you. Or, you could take the slightly less obvious approach, and throw a small pebble at her foot. That would prevent the possibility of being mistaken for a biting bug. The larger the pebble, the better, but also the heavier. At your size, a pebble seemed like a boulder. It might just work, though.

You decide that you have to make a choice before Kelcie finishes texting on her phone, so you...
145132.title: Your bite went unnoticed.

choices: Kelcie squeals in pain. (Wow, nice work)
It bounces and lands between her toes.
1451322.content: ...decide to begin searching for a decent-sized rock that you could toss at her. Thought it seemed sort of primitive, beggars couldn't be choosers. Lucky for you the house was sort of old, and its porch was a little worse for the wear. Crumbling slightly in places, there was bound to be at least one good candidate around here that you could use to achieve Keclie's notice. After just a couple of minutes you have manage to pry a loose piece of cement from a minute hole in the step. The pebble is remarbly half of your size, though, so it'll do pretty nicely. After taking another few minutes to tote it over there you're all ready for phase one. Lifting the pebble with all of your might, you toss it at her undefended foot.
1451322.title: Good Luck

choices: Bekah
Kelcie
Beth
Sara
Alina
15.content:
When you woke up, you didn't know what the hell you were going to do. Since you shrunk on the floor, and not on a higher surface, it would be harder to get the girls' attention. Plus, if they found you, what then? Most of them were pretty friendly, but you never knew what they would do if they found you shrunk. Then again, would you even be noticed at such a size?

Luckily, some girls were in the dining room right now, getting some snacks while taking a break from dancing. You started out of the corner to at least try to get help, when all of a sudden a giant foot slammed down in front of you! It belonged to..
15.title: Impossible!

choices: Beth doesn't hear anything and walks on.
Beth looks down and notices you.
Beth looks down and notices a bug.
153.content: You gazed in amazement at the sheer of size of the enormous tennis shoe that lay before you. You stared upward, hoping to get a clue on who it belonged to. You immediately received your answer. It was Beth. The Freshman with the unusual pink hair. She always said it was natural, but you knew for a fact that it was dyed. What a special girl Beth was. However, something seemed...off from her usual appearance. Beth's usual face of cheerfulness was replaced by worry. She seemed uncomfortable, as if she had lost something near and dear to her. You realize this is a perfect opportunity to get Beth's attention. You begin to shout at the top of your lungs, hoping the giant freshman will hear your plea. What happens?
153.title: Beth

choices: Make some kind of desperate signal to her, hoping she'll recognize you as human
Run to cover under some furniture
Another girl walks in, distracting Beth momentarily so you can get onto her shoe
1533.content:
You began wracking your brain for potential options. The tennis shoe would theoretically be pretty easy to board and latch onto, then you could wait for the perfect lull to try and get Beth's attention. As much as this unaware titanic women posed a significant danger to you, they simultaneously held the keys to your salvation. There was no way you could help yourself in this diminutive state. Contacting a friend you could trust was your sole realistic chance at survival, and ideally, returning to normal size. You glanced once more at the colossal shoe, weighing your options, looking up at Beth to gauge the likelihood of her noticing you.

Your heart nearly stops. Oh, she was going to notice you already. As you crane your neck to look up at your pink-haired classmate, her heavy, almost divine gaze has already begun to fall upon you. However, it does not bode well for you. No sooner had her massive eyes locked onto you than her lip began to curl in disgust. You already knew where this was going, praying internally that it wasn't what you thought. All traces of doubt were eliminated by her next deafening words:
"Ugh, another fucking bug? You gotta be fucking kidding me. This place is a dump," she boomed, in a thunderous yet feminine tone. You had few choices.
1533.title: Pest Spotted

choices: It's Beth
It's Alina
15332.content:
Even as Beth raised her colossal foot, you were running for cover. Clearly, she didnâ€™t recognize you and thought you were an insect, and while there were many ways for this meeting to end, you preferred the one where you didnâ€™t end up as a stain on her shoe. So you ran as fast as you could, hoping to outrun her stomp, and hoping to hide. There! Shelter! As the pink-haired titaness brought down her gargantuan sneaker, you dove under the sofa.

         You barely made it. With a crash, Beth slammed her foot into the carpet, sending out a burst of air that shoved you deeper into the dusty couch and rattled your eardrums. As your head cleared, you waited tensely for any sign of movement. Would she come after you? And if she did, would she look under the sofa? Just to be on the safe side, you cautiously crawled to the other side of the sofa. Directly above you, the sofa was unoccupied, but on the other side, you could see your cousin, Bekah. Surely she would recognize you? So, you begin to climb up the sofa, towards the empty cushion, trying to remain hidden for as long as possible. When you reach the top, you run to the center of the cushion and start yelling. "BEKAH! BEKAH!"

         While she doesn't seem to notice, you start hearing the pounding of feet coming towards the couch. You redouble your efforts, but Bekah remains blissfully unaware. Then, out of the periphery, you see someone stop in front of your sofa cushion. Fearfully, you turn to see who it is.
15332.title: Sofa Shenanigans

choices: Climb onto her shoe
She accidentally drops a chip on you
Someone else enters
154.content:
You walked out of the corner only to have a massive white Converse sneaker slam down in front of you. You look up to see Sara, the party host, idly refilling snacks. She's wearing a nice green tank top (matching her eyes), and skinny jeans that clasp around her ankles. Her white sneakers almost looked brand new, except you could see from the bottoms that they were pretty worn.

Above, Sara is humming to the music from the other room, and tapping her feet to the tune. This sends shockwaves through you, and made clear how dangerous the party hostess was. As you stand in horror, she pivots her massive foot, causing her massive sneaker to slam into your chest. It knocks you down, and you see the diamond pattern of her sneaker hover close to your face. You brace for impact as she lowers her foot, but you give a sigh of relief as the toe of her shoe hovers only slightly above you. You crawl back quickly before she lowers her toe.

You look up at the beautiful brunette giantess as she continues to tend to the snack table. You had to get her attention somehow. Maybe her bare ankle could be a start.
154.title: Giant Hostess

choices: Go for her ankle
Someone calls her into the other room
You fall off her shoe
1541.content:
You can't believe what's happening. One second you were scanning the party, and the next you were in danger of getting flattened by your friend. You look up at Sara again, in awe of her massive size. All of a sudden, she shifts her foot and the underside of her Converse flies over you. The wind knocks you down, and you realize you can't stay on the ground. At the moment, it looks like the monolithic Sara is your best chance of survival, but also the best chance of your death.

You run up to her white Converse shoe and begin to bang on it. No response. Looks like your going to have to climb. You jump back and stumble as Sara unwittingly taps her foot to the music, causing miniature earthquakes for you. You brace yourself, jump, and latch onto the bottom border of her shoe. You hold on with all your might as Sara taps her toe again.

You finally are able to pull yourself up, and immediately find yourself clinging to the laces. This was good move, as Sara takes a step to her right in her menial task of refilling the snack table. You take a moment to breathe, taking comfort in the fact that you weren't crushed like a bug by your friend. But you didn't take much comfort of the motion sickness caused by Sara's shift to the right. It's time to make your next move.
1541.title: Scaling the Shoe

choices: You fly off
You hold on
15412.content:
"Sara! Come back to the party!" A feminine voice shouts from the other room. "Be there in a second," Sara shouts back, her voice booming above you. You start to panic as Sara puts down the chips and starts walking. Her step causes you to stumble , but you catch on to the loose laces. You grab the aglet of her sneaker as soars through the air. You hang on tight as the G-forces attempt to pull you down.

BOOM! Her foot lands, causing the laces to bounce a little. You fly back up to the tongue of the sneaker, and quickly decide to hide in there. You grab hold of the canvas stitching and lay down on Sara's surprising soft socks as she continues walking back to the party.

After what seems like hours of torture, Sara arrives at her destination, you look up out of her sneaker to see a sea of female legs dancing to the party music. Maybe catching a ride wasn't the best choice, because now you're in a minefield of life-crushing feet. You stand in awe looking at the towering giantesses.

"What did you want, Bekah?" Sara says over the loud music.

"Oh thank goodness. She might be able to help," you say to yourself.

"Dance with me, Sara!" Bekah shouts, obviously wasted.

"Or not," you quickly say as Bekah yanks Sara by the arms, taking her into a spin. You attempt to hang on to Sara's shoe, but it might be best just to let go.

1543.title: Someone else enters

info.brief_description: It seemed an ordinary night, but when the clock strikes midnight you suddenly shrink.
info.description:
Welcome, here's the basic setting of the story, although the beginning depends on your first choice at the intro:

You're awake at a party that's sort of going late into the night, so most people are just going to stay over. You're there with some of your friends, just acquaintances from school, bullies, enemies, etcetera. The time is quickly reaching 12 AM, but it's hardly winding down. Suddenly, as the clock strikes midnight, you shrink to roughly a half an inch. Where that happens will be up to you, but chances are you're going to find yourself in a dangerous position in this much larger world around you. Try to survive, maybe indulge in some fantasies; we'll see how it goes. Get ready to enter the night of your tiny life.

Main Character (YOU):

Your name is your name, so don't make one up. Just either don't mention it in dialog or leave a blank, I don't mind either way. I am going to say though, that you're roughly fifteen or sixteen. You're a fairly well-liked guy, but you have your enemies, and some of these are at the party with you.

Starting Characters: (These bios may be expanded as the story progresses)

Bekah: Your older cousin, eighteen years old. Black hair, brown eyes. Average height.

Kelcie: Fifteen, in a few of your classes. Black hair, tan skin, tall for a girl. Barely knows you.

Beth: A freshman at your school, about fourteen. Has always been nice to you. Pink hair, blue eyes. Shortish for her age.

Sara: The resident of the house, also party hostess. 17. A friend of yours for a while. Brunette with green eyes.

Alina: Goth girl you've recently met, about nineteen. Black hair.

Important Rules:

-Giantesses only. I'm adamant about this. No other males, this is from a straight, shrunken man's point of view.
-No scat or piss stuff, please. It's a plague to these sort of interactives.
-Please use correct grammar to the best of your ability.
-Sizeable chapters, and by the I mean at least a paragraph. Exceptions being choice chapters.
-Not too crazy about the sexual aspect of all of this, as it is for the most part unaware
-Also, I reserve the right to delete any post included in the story that does not meet the standards I've just explained.

Given you've abided to these relatively simple rules, have fun with it! I know it seems like a lot, but it'll make this story great if people participate and make this interactive interesting. And again, welcome to the story and thank you.

GP Will be given based on quality of chapter.
